Pre-Game Insights: The All Whites are ‘raring to go’ for their international friendlies against Mexico and the United States, according to head coach Darren Bazeley.
Despite making injury-forced changes to the squad, Bazeley emphasized the depth of the team and the opportunities for new players.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The squad includes players from various leagues such as EPL, Serie A, and Ligue 1.
Darren Bazeley highlighted the importance of testing the team against bigger opponents to prepare for qualification to the 2026 FIFA World Cup.
Others: The games are scheduled for September 8 and 11, 2024.
